name: Cook the Book: Fresh Mint-Chocolate Speckled Milkshake
description: When I stumbled upon this recipe for Fresh Mint-Chocolate Speckled Milkshake in Bobby Flay's Burgers, Fries & Shakes, happy childhood memories came flooding back to me.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup coarsely chopped fresh mint leaves plus 4 whole mint leaves and additional Sprigs for garnish (optional)
11 ounces premium vanilla ice cream (about 1 3/4 packed cups)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the milk, chopped mint leaves, and sugar in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer. Transfer to a bowl, cover, and refrigerate for at least 8 hours and up to 24 hours. Strain the milk into a bowl.

Pour 1/2 cup of the mint-flavored milk into a blender (reserve the remaining 1/2 cup milk for another shake), add the whole mint leaves, and blend for 5 seconds. Add the ice cream and blend until almost smooth, about 7 seconds. With the motor running, slowly pour the melted chocolate through the feed tube on the lid of the blender and blend for 5 seconds. Serve immediately, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired.
Adults: Add 1 ounce (2 tablespoons) crème de menthe to the blender when you add the mint-flavored milk.
Chocolate-chocolate mint shake Substitute chocolate ice cream for the vanilla ice cream.
